metadata.title: CVE-2023-24752 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: libde265 v1.0.10 was discovered to contain a NULL pointer dereference inthe ff_hevc_put_hevc_epel_pixels_8_sse function at sse-motion.cc. Thisvulnerability allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via acrafted input file.

criterions.comment: libde265: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
